## Subspace.getPnpmOptions() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Returns the parsed contents of the pnpm-config.json config file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getPnpmOptions(): PnpmOptionsConfiguration | undefined;
```
**Returns:**

[PnpmOptionsConfiguration](./rush-lib.pnpmoptionsconfiguration.md) \| undefined
